DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect gemcabene LDL-C lipid parameter hypercholesterolemic patient stable dose statin .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Gemcabene Hypercholesterolemic Patients Stable Statin Therapy
DOC.criteria: Males Females 18 65 year age Baseline LDLC ≥ 130 mg/dL ( 3.4 mmol/L ) If female , postmenopausal surgically menopausal Triglycerides ( TG ) > 400 mg/dL Creatine phosphokinase ( CPK ) > 3 × upper limit normal ( ULN ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 35 kg/m2 Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( HbA1c > 10 % ) Renal dysfunction ( blood urea nitrogen [ BUN ] creatinine > 2 × ULN ) Hepatic dysfunction ( aspartate aminotransferase [ AST ] alanine aminotransferase [ ALT ] > 2 × ULN ) Myocardial infarction , severe unstable angina pectoris , coronary angioplasty , coronary artery bypass graft , major cardiovascular event result hospitalization previous month
